scripts.cucumber: npx cucumber-js 'src/features/**/*.feature' --require-module ts-node/register --require './src/config/load-env.ts' --require './src/utils/cucumber-timeout.ts' --require 'src/step-definitions/hooks/**/*.ts' --require 'src/step-definitions/**/*.ts' --format html:./reports/cucumber/report.html --format progress --format summary
